title: Authorizes commissioner of agriculture and markets to seek injunctive relief for violations concerning kosher foods
summary: Authorizes the commissioner of agriculture and markets to institute an action in law or equity regarding food and color additives and specifically enumerates such violations subject to enforcement and penalties.
